Look at the Other Team Again

Your team used to be covered in golden pijamas just like how they are all wearing purple like the walls of derse, but now your team all wears their own special costums to represent the heros you all are respectively. Now you need to just rap up talking to everyone and then you can leave to be on your way.

> Switch Characters
